author: nottherealtar
name: ServerAssistant
short: Server management, moderation, and anti-spam tools
description: ServerAssistant is a comprehensive server management cog with moderation tools (kick, ban, mute, warn, purge), anti-spam protection, autorole, verification buttons, logging, color roles, and server utilities.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores guild settings including autorole, log channel, and anti-spam configuration. No personal user data is stored.
